summary: A dramatisation of the early years of Doctor Who (1963), with the story revolving around BBC executive Sydney Newman, novice producer Verity Lambert and actor William Hartnell.
cast: David Bradley|Ross Gurney-Randall|Roger May|Sam Hoare|Charlie Kemp|Brian Cox|William Russell|Jeff Rawle|Andrew Woodall|Jessica Raine|Jemma Powell|Lesley Manville|Cara Jenkins|Sacha Dhawan|Toby Hadoke|Sarah Winter|Jamie Glover|Claudia Grant|David Annen|Mark Eden|Ian Hallard|Nicholas Briggs|Carole Ann Ford|Reece Pockney|Reece Shearsmith|Claire Ashton|Leslie Bates|David William Bryan|Ben Champniss|Kit Connor|Clive Doig|Brian Fenton|Michael Ferguson|John Foreman|Mathew Foster|Ken Garside|Ernest Gromov|William Hartnell|Sophie Holt|Thom Hutchinson|Samuel Lawrence|Jean Marsh|Paul McNamara|Lee Moulds|Mike Pinfield|Joseph Railton|Tony Robinson|Robert Ross|Edmund C. Short|Matt Smith|Ellie Spicer|Matthew Sweet|Donald Tosh|Robin Varley|Charles Walters|Anneke Wills
title: Una aventura en el espacio y el tiempo
